message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product. I'm excited to discuss the price with you. After careful consideration, I'm willing to offer you the product for $1000000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $800000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not comfortable going as low as $800000. Considering the product's value to me, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering the product to you for $900000. I believe this is a fair compromise.

Thank you for the counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $850000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
